item.description:
Going Deeper into Love, An Evening Exploration.

Discover how your beliefs about love, intimacy and sexuality affect your relationships, sexual satisfaction, marriage, body image and ability to find love. Our personal relationship workshops are about…

* Love, intimate and sexual relationships

* Improving body image to improve your relationships

* Making the right relationship choices for you

* Finding love, being honest and creating intimacy

Join us for a free introductory event with the Human Awareness Institute (HAI). In this mini-workshop you’ll have the opportunity to connect with others through verbal sharing and exercises designed to open your heart. Come and get a taste of what you’ve been craving, in a totally safe, non-sexual environment. Come and enjoy yourself. There won’t be a hard-sell. We promise. Our goal is to give you a meaningful evening of itself and to provide with information on this weekend long workshop.
item.name: Need Love? HAI Intro Event
